channel.title: Data Science on Abnormal Distributions
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on Abnormal Distributions

item.title: Three underrated data science skills
item.description: Dynamic expansion of skills Persuasion Empathy Conclusion This short post lists three critical data science skills that I feel don’t receive enough attention. Do a quick Google search for “top data science skills” and you will find a lot of conversation around programming, statistics, machine learning, and data visualization. Like many, in the earlier stages of my career I focused solely on developing these technical skills. To be clear, these are important skills that data scientists should strive to possess (to varying degrees).
